name: Viral
description: Viral is a fast-paced campaign based First Person Shooter with stylized enemy AI behavior. Set in the digital realm, you are the Firewall tasked with stopping a computer virus from infecting all programs. Equipped with an array of weapons and your wits, you will have to fight hordes of infected programs, explore vibrant digital environments and solve puzzles in order to progress. Are you the savior the Server needs?
